<MethodEndpoint
  method={"put"}
  path={"/admin/orgs/{orgId}/members"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Adds a member to the given organization.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"orgId","in":"path","description":"Organization numeric identifier","required":true,"schema":{"type":"integer","format":"int64"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"description":"Add member request","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"user":{"type":"string"}},"title":"AddMemberRequest"}}},"required":true}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"OK","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"member":{"type":"object","properties":{"userName":{"type":"string"},"firstName":{"type":"string"},"lastName":{"type":"string"},"avatar":{"type":"string"},"email":{"type":"string"},"role":{"type":"string","enum":["owner","member","collaborator"],"title":"OrgRole"},"memberId":{"type":"integer","format":"int64"},"userId":{"type":"integer","format":"int64"}},"title":"MemberDbDto"}},"title":"AddMemberResponse"}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
